'''''Open to Interpretation''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to attack the pigeons, scare away the dogs, collect the fish, and burn or blow away the leaves in ''[[Good Sign]]''.
